Layout¶

horizontalBalance¶

Controls the left-right distribution of the root node’s children:

0.0 - all nodes to the right 0.5 - nodes evenly balanced to left and right 1.0 - all nodes to the left

Type
Number
Default
0.5
verticalAlignFactor¶

Vertical align factor:

0.0 - top 0.5 - center 1.0 - bottom

Type
Number
Default
0.5
rootPadX¶

Horizontal padding around the root node

Type
Number
Default
160
nodePadX¶

Horizontal padding between the non-root nodes

Type
Number
Default
30.0
nodePadY¶

Vertical padding between the nodes

Type
Number
Default
8.0
sameWidthSiblings¶

Controls whether all sibling nodes should have the same width.

Type
Boolean
Default
yes
snapParentToChildren¶

Controls whether the connection point of the child nodes should be snapped to the parent’s connection point.

Type
Boolean
Default
no
snapToHalfPositions¶

Controls whether snapping halfway between two connection points is allowed.

Type
Boolean
Default
no
branchPadY¶

Vertical padding between child node groups

Type
Number
Default
25.0
radialMinNodes¶

Minimum number of siblings for arc node placement

Type
Number
Default
3
radialFactor¶

Roundness of the arc node placement

Type
Number
Default
2.2
